concept.title: Convert Drawing Units
concept.shortdesc: When you create a new drawing in one systemof measurement (imperial or metric) and then change to the other system, use SCALEto scale the model geometry by the appropriate conversion factor to obtain correct distances and dimensions. The conversion is shown as follows:

conbody.p: For example, to convert inches to centimeters, you scale the drawing by a factor of 3.25. To convert from centimeters to inches, the scale factor is 1/3.25 or about 0.3077.
